text: Faces of Women (also known as in French as Visages de femmes) is a 1985 Ivorian French comedy-drama movie directed by Desiré Ecaré and starring Sidiki Bakaba, Albertine N'Guessan, Eugénie Cissé-Roland. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:Ivorian movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies
title: Faces of Women
